subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: On a team with the program's first Heisman Trophy winner and a stifling defense, the biggest question facing Alabama has been whether it can win the national title with Greg McElroy at the helm.
snippet: On a team with the program's first Heisman Trophy winner and a stifling defense, the biggest question facing Alabama has been whether it can win the national title with Greg McElroy at the helm.
